title: @RiotRepertoir why does Darius's W have no per point scalings at all?
body: it's kinda like azir's w pre 5.15 but it doesnt even scale per level. . . it looks very op for a lvl 1 wonder. why is there no incentive to lvl it up past 1?

replies.body: It gives a second off the cooldown. The patch notes read 9/8/7/6/5 >>> 8, when they should read 8 >>> 9/8/7/6/5
Why does there seem to be so many errors in the most important patch in 10(?) months?
Because it is the most important patch in 10(?) months!
The same can be sad for why it SHOULDN'T have errors

because so much work was done someone from his mentions on screwing up Repetoir I guess, forgot to deliver the proper updates into the system which meant that Scarizard had outdated notes and they have yet to be fixed, and the team will probably just go through them today to rewrite it correctly as well as check to make sure that the live values are the ones in the patch notes.
